channel.title: Tom Meloche on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti
channel.description: Recent content in Tom Meloche on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: a2b3 lunch non-summary for August 6, 2015 at Mi Compadre
item.description: The a2b3 lunch this week was at Mi Compadre, a Mexican place on Packard. We had a good turnout. I recommend the lengua tacos. I was inspired this week for the lunch question by going to the Workantile lunch on Wednesday, which followed the same general pattern - sit down, introduce yourself around the table, and answer some simple question. At Workantile the prompt was simply “share something nice that happened to you this week”, and that was enough of a prompt for everyone to be brief and cheery.

item.title: a2b3 lunch non-summary at Blue Nile for 30 July 2015
item.description: Nice lunch today at the Blue Nile. We had 10 people for lunch, including two people (Azita Azadi and Tom Meloche) who had moved back to town from far away. I had the vegetarian plate which was delicious (love me some injera). The question of the day was regarding postcards, something I’m thinking about quite a bit. With a modest (but still too big) amount of effort I can launch a postcard from the command line of my Mac.
